api/GetApiList: Shows a list of all API-calls, hence the API-documentation
api/GetVersionInfo: Shows the current version of RPMS & the last update-timestamp
api/GetUpdateLog/x: Get the last x lines of the update-log
api/GetApiLog/x: Get the last x lines of the API-log
api/GetResourceInfo: Show system-resources like memory- and CPU-usage, system-load
api/GetDiskList: Show list of disks: status, usage
api/DoUpdateServer: Update RPMS to the latest version
